title: 使用命令生成一个带命令的掉落物告示牌
author: 煜之火炬

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
/summon item ~ ~1 ~ {Item:{id:"minecraft:sign",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"唯一·传送牌",Lore:["该传送牌具有唯一属性"," 切勿破环！"]},BlockEntityTag:{Text1:"{\"text\":\"123\",\"color\":\"yellow\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/say this yellow\"}}"}}}}

???
